resources.string: Sekar Saluyu is one of the Sundanese art gallery and art studio in Sekeloa north of Bandung City, this studio has a variety of arts.

Sekar Saluyu was founded in 1918 based on the book that the father holds, Sekar Saluyu was inaugurated in 1933.


Mr. Usep worked on 14 kinds of art that first there kesnian martial arts, there rudet (rudet is almost the same as marching band, but the original sunda) outs, angklung and others.


Father also often make a sunda song for sholawatan, one of them is lais, sulak and debus.


In 1996 Mr. Usep began to manage art Sekar Saluyu, this art is a hereditary art, and now his most big children already have their own studio.


Sundanese language is expensive because why people can not Sundanese Sundanese language, which obviously comes from the Sundanese region Sumedang, Garut, Ciamis, Cianjur, Bogor and Banten. Now in Banten there is still a sunda wiwitan namaynya. Sundanese culture is still sticky. There is a Baduy tribes in the world, which is now beginning to modernize. If we acknowledge as a Sundanese, we should be able to speak Sundanese. Why should we like karawitan as a Sundanese? Because karawitan is our example. For example, in the karawitan there are standards a light example of it there is catrik and kulu-kulu (one of gamelan music), the catrik it,s 2 and 5 benchmark whereas goong and saron have to exist in five, now that is life example, why always at-5? Because the first 5 is the same as the point of Pancasila, because we live in the country of Indonesia. Pancasila there gotong-royong, togetherness, it is actually people who have implement the village.

This app is presenting a short lesson about sundanese cultures such as dance, music instrument, etc. You also can books reservation for various events and sundanese culture class from Sekar Saluyu Art Studio.
